name: Ds rna target window
tagline: Identifies optimal window for dsRNA targeting
body: usage: dsRNA_target_window [-h] [-win_size WINDOW_SIZE] [-pos_bonus POS_BONUS_MOD] [-run_bonus RUN_BONUS_MOD] input_alignment output_file positional arguments: input_alignment output_file optional arguments: -h, --help show this help message and exit -win_size WINDOW_SIZE, --window_size WINDOW_SIZE -pos_bonus POS_BONUS_MOD, --pos_bonus_mod POS_BONUS_MOD -run_bonus RUN_BONUS_MOD, --run_bonus_mod RUN_BONUS_MOD
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
